title: Average living space of PRH tenants Hong Kong 2007 to 2019
yAxis: Average living space in square meters per person
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Average living space in square meters per person. In total the number of data points it has is 7.
In general Average living space in square meters per person has rose over the Year.
Average living space in square meters per person is slightly increasing from 2007 to 2012, and lastly roughly constant from 2012 to 2019.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2009 and 2012.
The highest Average living space in square meters per person, of value 13.3 was reached at Year 2018, and 2019
The lowest Average living space in square meters per person, of value 12.2 was reported at Year 2007
